content: part flower part pop-it all fun this no-sew crochet flower fidget toy is a playful and tactile project that s perfect for restless hands with a poppable flower petals that mimics the satisfying feel of a classic pop-it it s a great sensory tool for kids and adults who love to fidget no sewing required made by crocheting pieces together this pattern is written using us crochet terms i crocheted this fidget toy using the yarn under single_crochet 1 technique this technique makes the stitches tighter and more aligned you will want to have tighter gauge for this project so it will pop crochet in continuous spiral rounds do not join at the end of each round unless otherwise stated use a running stitch marker 2 to keep your place when crocheting in rounds use invisible decrease 3 for a nicer finish use the ultimate finish 4 to neatly close up your amigurumi pieces optional use the invisible increase 5 and invisible decrease 6 to enhance the appearance of your amigurumi 1 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2022/05/how-to-yarn-under-single-crochet html 2 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-use-running-stitch-marker html 3 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-single-crochet-decrease html 4 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/close-amigurumi-ultimate-finish html 5 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/03/how-to-invisible-increase-in-crochet html 6 https //www onceuponacheerio com/2023/04/how-to-single-crochet-decrease html
